entry.title: Tadiwa approved for Mitacs internship!
entry.content: Congratulations Tadiwa for winning Mitacs award to travel to the University of Bologna for an internship with Dr. Fulvia Antonelli.
entry.summary: Congratulations Tadiwa for winning Mitacs award to travel to the University of Bologna for an internship with Dr. Fulvia Antonelli.

entry.title: Rachel and Justen Win AGES Awards!

link.title: Rachel and Justen Win AGES Awards!

entry.title: Dr. Sam Defends her PhD!
entry.content: Congratulations to Dr. Samantha Leech for succesfully defending her PhD titled “Brain Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy: Advances and Applications to Chronic Pain in Knee Osteoarthritis”. The Manske lab wishes her the best of luck as she pursues medicine at the University of Saskatchewan.
entry.summary: Congratulations to Dr. Samantha Leech for succesfully defending her PhD titled “Brain Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy: Advances and Applications to Chronic Pain in Knee Osteoarthritis”. The Manske lab wishes her the best of luck as she pursues medicine at the University of Saskatchewan.

entry.title: Dr. Ainsley Defends her PhD!
entry.content: Congratulations to Dr. Ainsley Smith for succesfully defending her PhD. The Manske lab wishes her the best of luck as she remains at the University of Calgary to pursue medicine.
entry.summary: Congratulations to Dr. Ainsley Smith for succesfully defending her PhD. The Manske lab wishes her the best of luck as she remains at the University of Calgary to pursue medicine.

entry.title: Dr. Michael Defends his PhD!
entry.content: Congratulations to Dr. Michael Kuczynski for succesfully defending his PhD titled “Characterizing the structure-function relationship of hand osteoarthritis using dynamic and high resolution CT imaging”. The Manske lab wishes him the best fo luck as he begins his post doctoral fellowship with Dr. Danielle Whittier here at the McCaig Institute.
entry.summary: Congratulations to Dr. Michael Kuczynski for succesfully defending his PhD titled “Characterizing the structure-function relationship of hand osteoarthritis using dynamic and high resolution CT imaging”. The Manske lab wishes him the best fo luck as he begins his post doctoral fellowship with Dr. Danielle Whittier here at the McCaig Institute.

entry.title: Tadiwa Waungana Defends his MSc!
entry.content: Congratulations to Tadiwa Waungana for succesfully defending his PhD titled “Bone and 3D Joint Space Width Analysis in Knee Osteoarthritis using Weight Bearing CT”. However, the good bye party will have to wait as Tadiwa is continuing his PhD studies in the Manske lab.
entry.summary: Congratulations to Tadiwa Waungana for succesfully defending his PhD titled “Bone and 3D Joint Space Width Analysis in Knee Osteoarthritis using Weight Bearing CT”. However, the good bye party will have to wait as Tadiwa is continuing his PhD studies in the Manske lab.

entry.title: Ainsley Wins Vanier Award!
entry.content: Congratulations Ainsley for winning the Vanier Canada Graduate Scholarship, one of the most prestigious awards available to doctoral students in Canada, valued at $50,000 per year for three years.
entry.summary: Congratulations Ainsley for winning the Vanier Canada Graduate Scholarship, one of the most prestigious awards available to doctoral students in Canada, valued at $50,000 per year for three years.
